stimulusHtml: The Hypostyle Hall at the Temple of Amun-Re at Karnak most likely includes columns resembling blossoming papyrus stalks within the enormous, dimly lit interior to evoke in visitors the impression of
choicesHtml: witnessing the creation of the world arising from the primordial sea
entering a sacred labyrinth filled with prophetic voices of plantlike deities
being transported into the dark underworld to be judged by Osiris
receiving a vision of the afterlife as a garden of paradise
